Package com.vangav.backend.images.segments_and_features

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Feature
    Feature is a parent for all Features extracted from Segments
    FeatureGridSpaces
    |--A--|--B--|--C--| 1-----------------4 ------------------- 2--D--|--E--|--F--5 ------------------- 3-----------------6 |--G--|--H--|--I--| FeatureGridSpaces gets the percentage of empty spaces along the lines of a segment's grid For example if the segment has the letter O the following will approximately represent this feature according to the drawing above: A: 40% B: 0% C: 40% D: 0% E: 80% F: 0% G: 40% H: 0% I: 40% 1: 40% 2: 0% 3: 40% 4: 40% 5: 0% 6: 40%
    Pixel
    Pixel represents an image's pixel
    PixelId
    PixelId represents an image's pixel's ID Can act as a key (e.g.: for a hash map)
    Segment
    Segment represents an image's segment A segment is a part of an image that has one or more feature(s) (shape, color, ...)
    SegmentId
    SegmentId represents an image's segment's ID Can be a hash id (e.g.: in a hash map)
